Text.Page:
There's a chamber in the refuge we've been unable to penetrate, locked tight with an Eldritch Seal.

Fortunately for us, federation intelligence has come up with a solution: a seal deactivation scroll!

Once we've used the scroll, we can figure out what these cultists are trying so hard to protect.

Argons? HERE!?!

Oh, no.

This means the Cult of Lok...and Atel Akaad...are working with the argons.

This means doom.
